Html:
Seeing an odd behaviour

I start my map, and see the tiles, I can zoom in and out of the map no problem.  I have a button setup to load a list of map points from a database and zoom into them.

        List mm = RouteDB.Instance.markersForRoute(routeid);
            meters.Markers.Clear();
            foreach (GMapMeterMarker m in mm)
            {
                meters.Markers.Add(m);
            }
            GMap.ZoomAndCenterMarkers(meters.Id);

 

I see the points and can see the tile borders and labels but the tiles themselves are not painting (I have tried adding a refresh, and changing the map provider with no luck.

This code worked fine in my testbed app. The chief difference here is the map is loaded as part of another custom control would that affect painting?

 

Any suggestions welcome.

Rich in NY

Yes they Do.  I upgraded to the latest hot build but the problem still occurs. I also switched from my custom markers to a standard one with no luck.

Rich
i can't identify the reason ;/ can you be more specific?
Working on a test program to reproduce it and will send it to you.

Interesting enough I can't reproduce it outside this project, and if I take a control built in another project it works as well.

I will work out whats what and see if I can pin down the break point.

 

Sorry for the trouble.
